DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter Study of the Safety and Efficacy of the Human Anti-TNF Monoclonal Antibody Adalimumab in Subjects with Moderately to Severely Active Psoriatic Arthritis
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Safety and Efficacy of the Human Anti-TNF Monoclonal Antibody Adalimumab in Subjects With Moderately to Severely Active Psoriatic Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe PsA Inadequate response to DMARD therapy Corticosteroid stable dose <= 10 mg QD DMARDs must have been taken for 3 months and stable dose for 4 weeks MTX maximum dose = <= 30 mg/week Active chronic plaque PS or documented history of chronic plaque PS No other active skin disease
